text: Ashraf Din (born 15 May 1970) is a Dutch Pakistani cricket umpire. Ashraf Din serves as a member of the ICC Associate and Affiliate Panel of Umpires representing the Netherlands. He was the umpire for the ICC World Cricket League match played between the Netherlands and Nepal. He also worked 25 years as an instructor for the Royal Dutch Armed Forces. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1970 births Category:Dutch cricket umpires Category:People from Lahore Category:Pakistani emigrants to the Netherlands
title: Ashraf Din
